attributes.action: cancel all charges paid by people abroad to RECEIVE phone calls via mobile phone
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have always thought that paying to receive calls via a mobile phone whilst abroad is unacceptable. But being forces wives it is hard enough to have our partners sent away, let alone have no contact if they do not have enough limit/credit left to take our calls. Welfare cards are only issued to operational detatchments/deplayments. NOT exercises, training and non operational deployments.
